ygData.subject: RE: Charm story and tactics (was RE: SoW vs. Accelerand o vs. giants & charm)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah.  The problem now is actually finding two like-level mobs to play charm tricks with, and managing to keep them far enough from other people so that
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Sep 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> charm hehe). well next two tries i killed 4 SGs without losing any health.
> its all playing selo's in between charms and timing your recharming. i

Yeah. The problem now is actually finding two like-level mobs
to play charm tricks with, and managing to keep them far
enough from other people so that they don't decide to attack
because they can't find anything else to fight. (For some
reason most people don't seem to understand that if two mobs
are fighting each other, then someone is causing it. They
don't see a player fighting them so they think the mobs are
free.)

It doesn't seem to be a problem yet on the younger shards (I
saw lots of giants last night on Tunare), but it's painfully
evident on the older ones. I don't think I've seen two giants
at once (except ice giants) in the entire last month on
Karana. And when we did try fighting ice giants, the kill
stealers descended like flies to sh!t within a half hour.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
